original_text: But the Jewish leaders in Jerusalem did not agree with that. So then I asked the Roman rulers to send me here to Rome. I wanted Caesar himself to judge me. That was the only thing that I could do. I did not want to say anything bad against my own people.
korean_text: 유대인들이 반대하기로 내가 마지 못하여 가이사에게 상소함이요 내 민족을 고발하려는 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: But the Jewish leaders in Jerusalem did not agree with that.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 예루살렘의 유대 지도자들은 그것에 동의하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: So then I asked the Roman rulers
to send me here to Rome.
I wanted Caesar himself to judge me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 황제 자신이 나를 심판해주길 원했습니다.

sentences.original_text: That was the only thing that I could do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 할 수 있는 유일한 일이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: I did not want to say anything bad against my own people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성에 대해 나쁜 말을 하고 싶지 않았습니다.
